gameutils.networking
Class Packet

java.lang.Object
  gameutils.networking.Packet

public class Packet
extends Object

A Packet holds is a container of any type of data.

Author:
Roi Atalla

Constructor Detail

Packet

public Packet(Object... messages)
Initializes this object. The InetSocketAddress is set to null.

Parameters:
messages - A variable number of data to be written to this Packet.

Packet

public Packet(SocketAddress address,
              Object... messages)
Initializes this object.

Parameters:
address - The address to connect to or which is received from.
messages - A variable number of data to be written to this Packet.
